description: Smile acts as the mechanic for the http://anidb.net/ch20888 [Academy]. He first meets http://anidb.net/ch18062 [Maya] and the others when http://anidb.net/ch18063 [Ami] requested his and http://anidb.net/ch18057 [JK]`s help to find the possessed former principal. Smile is shown to be very adept at physical combat although he often carries an enormous wrench as a weapon. He is usually shown to be with http://anidb.net/ch18057 [JK].
name: Smile
